channel.title: Bogdan Vidrascu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Bogdan Vidrascu's Blog

item.title: First
item.description:
You know, sometimes the first step is the easiest. You hear and see so many new things, you detach from the inner workings of yourself. You take in the otherness as being the center of the real and forget existing.

otherwise

you might just see yourself through.

item.title: Before
item.description: Sometimes you have to find new ways to write in order to put in order thoughts you have thought in a worse system.
